description: Discover how Nao Medical's chiropractor allergy test can help you identify and treat your allergies. Book an appointment today!
cleaned_text: Do you suffer from allergies? You're not alone. According to the [CDC](https://www.cdc.gov/climateandhealth/effects/allergen.htm), allergies are the 6th leading cause of chronic illness in the United States. Allergies can cause a range of symptoms, from sneezing and runny nose to itchy eyes and skin rashes. If you're tired of suffering from allergies, Nao Medical can help. What is a Chiropractor Allergy Test? A chiropractor allergy test is a non-invasive, painless way to identify the allergens that are causing your symptoms. At Nao Medical, our chiropractors use muscle testing to determine which allergens are causing your body to react. This test is safe, effective, and can be done in just one visit. During a chiropractor allergy test, our chiropractors will use muscle testing to determine which allergens are causing your body to react. This test is non-invasive and painless.
